meanings.definition: Inhibiting or preventing cell growth or division.
meanings.sent1: The cytostatic treatment slowed down the growth of the cells.
meanings.sent2: The doctor prescribed a cytostatic medication to stop the cells from multiplying.
meanings.sent3: The cytostatic lotion made the cells so lazy, they refused to divide!
meanings.sent4: Her presence in the room was like a cytostatic force, halting all movement around her.
meanings.sent5: The cytostatic barrier stood strong, blocking any cell from advancing.

meanings.definition: A substance that inhibits or prevents cell growth or division.
meanings.sent1: The scientist developed a new cytostatic to use in cancer treatment.
meanings.sent2: Doctors use cytostatics to target fast-growing cells in the body.
meanings.sent3: The cytostatic in the petri dish seemed to be having a dance-off with the cells.
meanings.sent4: The cytostatic acted like a traffic jam, stopping the cells from moving forward.
meanings.sent5: The cytostatic injection was like a superhero swooping in to save the day for the patient's cells.
